section.p: Insert Internal Entity Dialog allows you to insert a declared internal entity to the current document position.

The left pane of the dialog shows the tree of declared internal entities. The Internal DTD Subset subtree represents internal entities declared in the edited document, while the External DTD Subset shows internal entities declared in the DTD file that is external to the edited document.
From the left pane, select the internal entity that you wish to insert.
The right pane shows the content of the selected entity (in plain text).
Click OK to complete the operation.
